29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

125435.name: Tracks of Destiny
125435.lore: Your victory is secured by countless failures, and the small steps you have taken led you to the turning point of fate.

186254.name: Regret of Infinite Ochema
186254.lore:
No matter how many bodies it steals, its wish remains unfulfilled. Like those who seek the medicines of immortality, it craves an imperishable vessel, one that will rid it of its fear of destruction. And yet, it knows this is a dream that will never come true.

"I have seen countless worlds devoured by The Blemished One's conflagration, and I was one of THEIR flames. I danced at the twirl of THEIR fingers, keenly aware that should the fuel burn out, this fire will also extinguish..."

409960.name: Traveler's Guide
409960.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>20,000</nobr> Character EXP.
409960.lore:
Required reading for world exploration. Press the "Read" button to tune in to an attractive voice in a language you understand, telling you about the legendary encounters of renowned adventurers across different worlds as well as the precious wisdom and knowledge that they have gathered.

"All-new series of the Traveler's Guide, The Chef's Manual to Galactic Cuisine, is now available for purchase."
"For submissions, please connect to synesthesia beacon ERD-23θ to contact an Intelligentsia Guild representative. Method of payment can be arranged to your convenience."

409961.name: Adventure Log
409961.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>5000</nobr> Character EXP.
409961.lore:
A neatly organized collection of educational adventure notes containing countless illustrations and texts entailing adventures from beginning to end, as well as valuable information and survival-related techniques.

"Why not just digitize it and save it on a photolith disk? That'd be much more convenient."
"Advanced technology is far more fragile than you'd think when faced with stellar storms and neuron flow eruptions. Besides, I'm sure the author of this book wanted people to read it in the simplest of ways."

409962.name: Travel Encounters
409962.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>1000</nobr> Character EXP.
409962.lore:
A travel diary with messy handwriting and random content. It's not of much use to you.

"Dan Heng, hurry up and finish reading it so you can throw it away."

549438.name: Extinguished Core
549438.desc: The heart of a monster wandering the Fragmentum. Crude material used for enhancement.
549438.lore:
It is a lesion that breeds evil, the impulse to sin. It is the source of the Fragmentum distortion.
A heavy blow has caused this heart to stop beating and lose its luster.

"Preliminary tests indicate it's some kind of hybrid: One half is primordial, and the other half is something very similar to Stellarons." — Department of Biology, Sarah Castro
comeFrom: Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

633379.name: Glimmering Core
633379.desc: The heart of a monster wandering the Fragmentum. Normal material used for enhancement.
633379.lore:
It is a lesion that breeds evil, the impulse to sin. It is the source of the Fragmentum distortion.
The heart is glimmering and the veins on it indicate it's still alive.

"What kind of monster is this? Did you see it... Its face! It has the face of our previous leader!"
comeFrom: Certain Fragmentum Monsters at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher
Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

635675.name: Key of Inspiration
635675.desc: A mythical key that appears in the hands of the Meditative Scholars. Used to level up Traces slightly for Erudition characters.
635675.lore:
It can unlock inspirations hidden deep within the conscience.
To take hold of the key is to grasp at the darting embers of thought that lead to the forward path.

"Eureka!"

717320.name: Squirming Core
717320.desc: The heart of a monster wandering the Fragmentum. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717320.lore:
It is a lesion that breeds evil, the impulse to sin. It is the source of the Fragmentum distortion.
The heart is pulsating slowly, with a residual force powerful enough to cause a new calamity. It's best to destroy it to prevent further troubles.

"It's like a cancer..."
comeFrom: Certain Fragmentum Monsters at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher
Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

836261.name: Key of Wisdom
836261.desc: A mythical key that appears in the hands of the greatest prodigies of the cosmos. Used to level up Traces significantly for Erudition characters.
836261.lore:
This is the proof of invitation to the halls of the Nous Temple.
Finding the door of which this key opens is a far more arduous task than obtaining the key itself. Those who pass through the doors will immediately realize the impossibility of returning to this side.

"The Erudition does not have answers to the universe, but it will teach you how to ask the right questions."

866634.name: Netherworld Token
866634.desc: The Aurumaton Spectral Envoy's weapon. Can be used for the Ascension of Physical characters.
866634.lore:
This is both a weapon used by the Ten-Lords Commission messengers to subdue mara and abominations, as well as a token they present when undertaking operations. No authorities of the mortal realm have jurisdiction over them.

"Messengers of Netherworld, authorized envoys of death's realm. Bearing orders for apprehension, with no pardon for transgressors."

920202.name: Key of Knowledge
920202.desc: A mythical key that appears in the hands of the sages of the worlds. Used to level up Traces moderately for Erudition characters.
920202.lore:
It can unlock the mysteries binding the truth of the world and grants knowledge beyond the understanding of humans.
No matter how the wielder attempts to display their possession of the key, no one but themselves can see its form. Some people believe that to be a gift from the heavens, while others think it's a sign of mental disorder.

"I had a dream of molecules coiling up into a loop like a snake biting its own tail. I woke up realizing that this is the answer I've been looking for all along!"

ranks.name: A Lacuna in Kingdom of Aesthetics
ranks.descHash: Each stack of Apotheosis additionally increases CRIT DMG by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>.

ranks.name: Agate's Humility
ranks.descHash: If the number of enemies on the field equals to <nobr>#1[i]</nobr> or more when the Ultimate is used, ATK increases by <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr> for <nobr>#3[i]</nobr> turn(s).

ranks.name: Thorny Road's Glory
ranks.descHash:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

ranks.name: Trumpet's Dedication
ranks.descHash: At the start of battle, gains <nobr>#1[i]</nobr> stack(s) of Apotheosis and increases the maximum stack limit of the Talent's effect by <nobr>#2[i]</nobr>.

ranks.name: Snow, From Somewhere in Cosmos
ranks.descHash:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

ranks.name: "Your" Resplendence
ranks.descHash: When using Ultimate, ignores <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> of enemy targets' DEF.

skills.descHash: Deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of Argenti's ATK to a single target enemy.
skills.name: Fleeting Fragrance

skills.descHash: Deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of Argenti's ATK to all enemies.
skills.name: Justice, Hereby Blooms

skills.descHash: Consumes #2[i] Energy and deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of Argenti's ATK to all enemies.
skills.name: For In This Garden, Supreme Beauty Bestows

skills.descHash: For every enemy hit when Argenti uses his Basic Attack, Skill, or Ultimate, regenerates Argenti's Energy by #1[i], and grants him a stack of Apotheosis, increasing his CRIT Rate by #2[f1]%. This effect can stack up to #3[i] time(s).
skills.name: Sublime Object

skills.descHash: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
skills.name: Attack

skills.descHash:
After using the Technique, enemies in a set area are inflicted with Daze for #1[i] second(s). Dazed enemies will not actively attack the team.
When attacking a Dazed enemy to enter combat, deals Physical DMG to all enemies equal to #2[i]% of Argenti's ATK and regenerates his Energy by #3[i].
skills.name: Manifesto of Purest Virtue

skills.descHash: Consumes #4[i] Energy and deals Physical DMG equal to #1[i]% of Argenti's ATK to all enemies. And further deals DMG for #2[i] extra time(s), with each time dealing Physical DMG equal to #3[i]% of Argenti's ATK to a random enemy.
skills.name: Merit Bestowed in "My" Garden

embedBonusSkill.descHash: At the start of a turn, immediately gains <nobr>#1[i]</nobr> stack(s) of Apotheosis.
embedBonusSkill.name: Piety

embedBonusSkill.descHash: When enemy targets enter battle, immediately regenerates <nobr>#1[i]</nobr> Energy for self.
embedBonusSkill.name: Generosity

embedBonusSkill.descHash: Deals <nobr>#2[i]%</nobr> more DMG to enemies whose HP percentage is <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> or less.
embedBonusSkill.name: Courage

voiceItems.title: First Meeting
voiceItems.text: My name is Argenti, I belong to the Knights of Beauty. May this rose convey my heartfelt salutations.

voiceItems.title: Greeting
voiceItems.text: Should misfortune befall you, do not hesitate to call upon me. I will protect you.

voiceItems.title: Parting
voiceItems.text: Forgive me, here we must part ways. It is my duty and destiny to traverse the universe alone. I'm sure our paths will converge again, somewhere.

voiceItems.title: About Self: Origin
voiceItems.text: Among the Knights of Beauty, I am one of the Honorclad — we are distinguished by our engraved armor.

voiceItems.title: Chat: The Knights of Beauty
voiceItems.text: The Knights tend to operate in solitude, spreading the grace of the Goddess far and wide across the universe. Nevertheless, we follow the same code of chivalry.

voiceItems.title: Chat: The spaceship "One and Only"
voiceItems.text: "One and Only" is the name of my spaceship. I must admit, keeping her in good order can be a chore. Perhaps I shouldn't have etched such intricate patterns into the fuselage.

voiceItems.title: Hobbies
voiceItems.text: I have a preference for thick, crusty baguettes. Slice them thinly so they're easier to store — a crucial snack for extended voyages.

voiceItems.title: Annoyances
voiceItems.text: The dazzling array of entertainment and gourmet delights offered by the IPC is quite staggering, but I regularly struggle with making sense of it all. Perhaps one day someone with experience will show me the ropes.

voiceItems.title: Something to Share
voiceItems.text: I've heard tales of warriors on a certain planet passing book pages over artificial limbs in order to infuse knowledge directly into their neural systems. It sounds so outlandish, and yet I find the idea quite inspired.

voiceItems.title: Knowledge
voiceItems.text: Did you ever hear tell of a planet where there is no concept of grotesquery? Even more intriguing — the people there have no concept of beauty, either.

voiceItems.title: About March 7th
voiceItems.text: Miss March possesses a pure heart, and such purity is rare and precious — there are far too many people who are inherently vulgar, profit-driven, and adept at flattery. I wish to extend more compassion and esteem towards people like her.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Companion Mission "Night of Universal Hallucinations"

voiceItems.title: About Himeko
voiceItems.text: This lady's spirit is admirably noble: Despite the challenges and hardships that Trailblazing entails, she has retained her poise and bravery — qualities that I profoundly admire. It is these qualities that I strive to embody and use against evil.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Companion Mission "Night of Universal Hallucinations"

voiceItems.title: About Dan Heng
voiceItems.text: While Mr. Dan Heng consistently maintains a sense of wariness towards others, his conduct remains unwaveringly honorable, and his expectations of himself are as stringent as the chivalric code. He possesses a unique form of beauty, I must say.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Companion Mission "Night of Universal Hallucinations"

voiceItems.title: About Welt
voiceItems.text: Despite the things he has endured, Mr. Yang stays true to his heart and knows how to appreciate the small joys of everyday life. A man whose wisdom and maturity I find admirable.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Companion Mission "Night of Universal Hallucinations"

voiceItems.title: About Pom-Pom
voiceItems.text: Such a fascinating ball of fluff. I imagine them to be exceptionally fitting perched atop a knight's shoulder, serving as a symbol of honor.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Companion Mission "Night of Universal Hallucinations"

voiceItems.title: About Wubbaboo
voiceItems.text: Haha, such an adorable little creature.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Companion Mission "Night of Universal Hallucinations"

voiceItems.title: About Trailblazer
voiceItems.text: Trailblazer's inherent qualities, are as beguiling and engaging now as they were on the day we first met.
voiceItems.unlockRequirement: Unlocked after completing the Companion Mission "Night of Universal Hallucinations"

voiceItems.title: Eidolon Activation
voiceItems.text: The Beauty is universal — they exist within our grasp and beyond the grand expanse of the galaxy.

voiceItems.title: Character Ascension
voiceItems.text: One solid stride at a time. Fear not the peril of descent.

voiceItems.title: Max Level Reached
voiceItems.text: I vow to make the grand name of "the Beauty" echo throughout the universe, till I draw my last breath.

voiceItems.title: Trace Activation
voiceItems.text: Though as knights we may tread different paths, destiny will bring us together at journey's end.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Trailblazer
voiceItems.text: To stand side by side with a noble soul like you, Trailblazer, is a great honor.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With March 7th
voiceItems.text: If I may, Miss March, allow me to use my modest power to get rid of the gloom!

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Dan Heng
voiceItems.text: Combat is a contest of wits. Dan Heng, I am honored to fight by your side.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Himeko
voiceItems.text: Miss Himeko, with your courage ablaze, the stars seem to shine even brighter.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Welt
voiceItems.text: Lend me your aid, Mr. Yang, with your intricate tactics and far-reaching vision.

voiceItems.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
voiceItems.text: Embrace virtue.

voiceItems.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
voiceItems.text: This storm shall pass.

voiceItems.title: Turn Begins 1
voiceItems.text: My oath is to a solitary rose.

voiceItems.title: Turn Begins 2
voiceItems.text: The Knights' duty is my guiding light.

voiceItems.title: Turn Idling
voiceItems.text: You who wander, what do your eyes seek?

voiceItems.title: Skill 1
voiceItems.text: The Beauty... is eternal.

voiceItems.title: Skill 2
voiceItems.text: Wretched... fleeting.

voiceItems.title: Hit by Light Attack
voiceItems.text: Flesh wound.

voiceItems.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
voiceItems.text: A test...

voiceItems.title: Ultimate: Activate
voiceItems.text: Until I see that light once more...

voiceItems.title: Ultimate: Unleash
voiceItems.text: ...I will protect all beauty in the universe.

voiceItems.title: Enhanced Ultimate: Unleash
voiceItems.text: ...For Idrila.

voiceItems.title: Downed
voiceItems.text: I... couldn't find THEM...

voiceItems.title: Return to Battle
voiceItems.text: My faith is unbreakable.

voiceItems.title: Health Recovery
voiceItems.text: My gratitude is yours.

voiceItems.title: Technique
voiceItems.text: Glory above all.

voiceItems.title: Battle Won
voiceItems.text: The darkness ends here.

voiceItems.title: Treasure Opening 1
voiceItems.text: Oh? I do like surprises.

voiceItems.title: Treasure Opening 2
voiceItems.text: I offer you the captivating aroma of a rose.

voiceItems.title: Precious Treasure Opening
voiceItems.text: A lustrous beauty that sets the heart and soul astir...

voiceItems.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
voiceItems.text: The consequence of wise deliberation.

voiceItems.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
voiceItems.text: Worry not, for I shall shoulder this responsibility.

voiceItems.title: Enemy Target Found
voiceItems.text: Care to test your skills?

voiceItems.title: Returning to Town
voiceItems.text: This familiar wind... a call to sweet remembrance.

storyItems.title: Character Details
storyItems.text:
A paragon knight of the Knights of Beauty.
He embodies righteousness and honor, possessing an admirable nobility. As a solitary wanderer in the cosmos, he wholeheartedly embraces the principles of "Beauty."
Upholding the honor of beauty in the universe has been Argenti's sacred duty. From the very beginning, he approached this duty with piety and unwavering conviction.

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part I
storyItems.text:
His hometown was ravaged by war for years, and the memories of his early childhood were tainted by the horrors of bloodshed and relentless shelling. Amidst the chaos, he sought refuge underground and, by chance, discovered an ocarina beneath a stone tile.
With trembling hands, he attempted to coax a melody from the instrument.
However, his "music" proved to be terrible.

Yet, the ethereal notes emanating from his ocarina became his sanctuary, a spiritual escape from the harsh reality.

Over time, the melodic strains faded into the recesses of his memory, becoming a mysterious and elusive moment. It was only years later, during a bard tour, when he saved a child from the flames of war and received a precious ocarina as a token of gratitude, that the melodies of his past resurfaced.
Holding the exquisite instrument in his hands, he examined its flawless and noble craftsmanship. Once again, the melodies of his childhood converged, evoking a flood of emotions and memories.
However, his "music" remained terrible.

"I'm too clumsy to master this instrument..."
He murmured in self-deprecation. Yet, after a profound moment of contemplation, a resolute courage ignited within him. He resolved to try once more, to weave a melody.
The music remained unchanged, but this time, he laughed wholeheartedly.

"Despite the terrible music, I love it. I believe it to be beautiful."
Carefully stowing away his ocarina, he once again embarked on his journey without hesitation.

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part II
storyItems.text:
After leaving his hometown, he became the apprentice of an elderly master.
Alongside physical and mental training, he would often listen to his master's tales of bygone eras — stories of transcendent beauty and mystical phenomena witnessed by the Minstrels.

"It was a world bathed in amber, draped in undisturbed stillness, where every being shed tears for the magnificent wonders veiled beneath its surface."
"Rumor has it that Idrila, after embarking on a journey spanning numerous cycles of Thirteen Amber Eras, will make a triumphant return to the universe during the elusive thirteenth month."

Day after day, his master imparted the essence of beauty to him. He learned to go beyond mere poetic recitation and embrace devotion as the embodiment of beauty, truly upholding its philosophy.

He understood that beauty was not just a code to follow but a way of life, an existence known as a knight.

However, his master departed from this world, and he once again set out on his lonely journey. He contemplated his existence, pondering the nature of his being. Instead of lamenting his solitude, he focused on becoming a true knight.

During his stay in an old city, he labored to restore its dilapidated streets.
He vanquished nightmarish monsters, and with the arrival of spring, rabbits frolicked once again in the woods.
He also briefly found companionship in the presence of another knight, who professed his faith in the blessings of the goddess residing within his armor.

"To give one's soul requires understanding that each encounter might be one's last, yet retreating is never an option."
"Carry these words of courage with you, my dear friend."

He contemplated on his lance, which bore the stains of countless battles fought in the name of Beauty.
With solemn reverence, he wiped away each mark, a testament to his tireless odyssey toward the pursuit of Beauty.

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part III
storyItems.text:
Since embarking on the Path of Beauty, a path of asceticism, he had faced numerous trials. Some presented themselves as prayers, others as opportunities for repentance, and still others as the seductive whispers of the Triple Demons.

Fearlessly, he confronted these temptations with an unwavering lance and an indomitable spirit. With each victory, his weaknesses, greed, and distractions dissolved into oblivion. He pledged to offer his soul and life at the feet of the Aeon of Beauty.

The profane words of the Triple Demons resembled fragmented ravings, morphing into manifestations of human desires.
They embodied the crass pursuit of personal gain, shameless indulgence in sin, the allure of power, and the enticement of battle and worldly pleasures.
Their aim was to erode repentance and replace it with the banality of common sense.

His blood mingled with his flowing locks on the battlefield, with each crimson droplet intertwined with honor. His lance stood resolute at his side, blessed by the divine to retain its everlasting sharpness.
The echoes of his esteemed master and comrades transformed into whispers. His spear would never yield, even if his master had succumbed to evil temptations.

Drenched in blood, teetering on the precipice of consciousness, he finally discerned a faint murmur that seemed to emanate from the very fabric of existence.

"You defy infamy. You proclaim glory. You are the Knights of Beauty.
With each triumph, you must confront yourselves anew, peering into the depths of your hearts and acknowledging the potential for malevolence."

"Congratulations! Once again, you have triumphed in the Trial of Reflection."

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part IV
storyItems.text:
The knights embraced diverse approaches in their pursuit of Beauty.
Some fervently embodied their beliefs until their final days, while others grappled with assumptions and defied heresies that could lead them into despair.
Some adorned themselves in armor and waged battles, while others saw themselves as unworthy, considering themselves the "ugly ones" unable to don the robe of beauty.

Yet, the unchanging truth remained in their collective quest to unravel the enigma of Idrila in the vast universe.
He vowed to uphold humility, mercy, and justice, remaining steadfast in honoring his oaths along the arduous path.
"Those freaks!... The Knights of Beauty are a bunch of freaks!"

As rumors of Idrila's demise spread throughout the cosmos, their perplexity deepened.
Piety intermingled with doubt, and laughter intertwined with lunacy.
Notions of honor, reputation, and infamy dissolved into nothingness.

This marked the end of everything.

When he finally encountered his former comrade, he found a knight who had become a fanatic, lost in a blind pursuit of power.
The former hero who had wielded a legendary weapon and vanquished the sky devourer had degenerated into a beast. His armor transformed into the scaly hide of the behemoth he had slain, his weapon into unyielding claws and fangs, and his blood into a viscous and restless flame. His eyes, once filled with wisdom, now burned with untamed wildness. The voice that had once addressed him as "my dear friend" had dwindled to a hissing cry.

The words spoken during the trial carried the weight of the Finality's impending prophecy, signaling the looming end.
Will he, himself... succumb to the clutches of the Omen of Evil?

name: Argenti
descHash: A paragon knight of the Knights of Beauty who is piously seeking his missing Aeon, Idrila the Beauty. Forthright and candid, he wanders the cosmos espousing the virtues of Idrila's good name.
